= Introduction =

This is tool that allows interaction and experimentation with Omeka package.

Acest instrument permite interacțiunea și experimentarea cu pachetul Omeka.

= Operations =

  # Download xammp.zip on HDD or memory stick. 
  # Unzip it.
  # Execute setup_xammp.bat from root of xammp newly created directory (every time you chose to move the xammp directory, rin this again to set the new paths for all the software components).
  # Follow instructions in the DOS screen.
  # Run xammp-control.exe (if you run it in Vista or Windows 7 it is useful to right click it and choose to run it as administrator).
  # If Windows asks to clear net access grant it for Apache and MySQL. XAMMP Control Panel will open.
  # Open the browser of your choice.
  # In the address bar go to http://127.0.0.1/omeka (for testing the current version) or http://127.0.0.1/omeka2 (to test the beta version of the new version)
